entry.content: Image: Humble, Paizo The Pathfinder Legacy bundle offers a stack of core rulebooks and supplements for just $25 Pathfinder is one of the best alternatives to Dungeons & Dragons, and if you‚Äôve been looking for a way to break into Paizo‚Äôs fantasy TTRPG, you can currently pick up a stack of second-edition core rulebooks and supplementary materials from Humble starting at just $5. The second-edition Pathfinder ruleset is an excellent system that we can definitely recommend for a more refined table...

entry.content: Image: VIZ Media Please don‚Äôt be an arena fighter, please don‚Äôt be an arena fighter, please don‚Äôt be an arena fighter... Marvel vs. Capcom 3 developer Eighting is currently making a fighting game based on the Hunter x Hunter franchise, publisher Bushiroad Games announced at the manga and anime-focused Jump Festa 2024 convention in Japan over the weekend (via Gematsu). entry.content: Image: FromSoftware/Bandai Namco The best deal yet on FromsSoftware‚Äôs massive mecha shooter If you haven‚Äôt had the chance to play Armored Core 6: Fires of Rubicon, Amazon, Target, and Best Buy have discounted the PlayStation 5 version to just $39.99 (was $59.99), the lowest price yet for the stompy mecha shooter. Armored Core 6 has cemented itself as a favorite in the Polygon offices, thanks to its hectic firefights and an array of possibilities for building your own Core. Make no mistake, AC6...

entry.title: Alan Wake 2, Max Payne actor James McCaffrey dead at 65 | Polygon - Gaming
entry.summary: Photo: John Paul Filo/CBS via Getty Images The actor died from multiple myeloma, his rep said James McCaffrey, the voice of Max Payne, died Sunday at 65, TMZ reports. A representative for McCaffrey ...
entry.content: Photo: John Paul Filo/CBS via Getty Images The actor died from multiple myeloma, his rep said James McCaffrey, the voice of Max Payne, died Sunday at 65, TMZ reports. A representative for McCaffrey told the publication that the actor, who is known for roles across Control and the Max Payne and Alan Wake franchises, died of multiple myeloma, and that he was surrounded by friends and family at the time of his death. ‚ÄúOne of Dick Wolf‚Äôs proteges (Swift Justice), McCaffrey went on to a successful ...

entry.title: Armored Core 6 update adds new parts, new maps | Polygon - Gaming
entry.summary: Image: Bandai Namco Ranked matchmaking is coming in patch 1.05 FromSoftware has a little end-of-year surprise for Armored Core fans. The developer will release patch 1.05 for Armored Core 6: Fires o...
entry.content: Image: Bandai Namco Ranked matchmaking is coming in patch 1.05 FromSoftware has a little end-of-year surprise for Armored Core fans. The developer will release patch 1.05 for Armored Core 6: Fires of Rubicon on Tuesday, bringing new content and features to the multiplayer component of the game, as well as a handful of new parts for players to outfit their ACs with. New in patch 1.05 is ranked online matchmaking, which is paired with ranked leaderboards that should hopefully inject some new lif...

entry.content: Posted by Kihyuk Sohn and Dilip Krishnan, Research Scientists, Google Research Text-to-image models trained on large volumes of image-text pairs have enabled the creation of rich and diverse images encompassing many genres and themes. Moreover, popular styles such as ‚Äúanime‚Äù or ‚Äústeampunk‚Äù, when added to the input text prompt, may translate to specific visual outputs. entry.title: Enhancing LLM Reasoning: Unveiling Chain of Code Prompting | KDnuggets
entry.summary: Chain of Code is an approach to interacting with language models, enhancing reasoning abilities through a blend of writing, executing, and simulating code execution, extending the capabilities of lang...
entry.content: Chain of Code is an approach to interacting with language models, enhancing reasoning abilities through a blend of writing, executing, and simulating code execution, extending the capabilities of language models in logic, arithmetic, and linguistic tasks, especially those requiring a combination of these.

entry.summary: In a paper published in Nature, we introduce FunSearch, a method for searching for ‚Äúfunctions‚Äù written in computer code, and find new solutions in mathematics and computer science. FunSearch works by ...
entry.content: In a paper published in Nature, we introduce FunSearch, a method for searching for ‚Äúfunctions‚Äù written in computer code, and find new solutions in mathematics and computer science. FunSearch works by pairing a pre-trained LLM, whose goal is to provide creative solutions in the form of computer code, with an automated ‚Äúevaluator‚Äù, which guards against hallucinations and incorrect ideas.

entry.summary: Posted by Catherine Armato, Program Manager, Google This week the 37th annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS 2023), the biggest machine learning conference of the yea...
entry.content: Posted by Catherine Armato, Program Manager, Google This week the 37th annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS 2023), the biggest machine learning conference of the year, kicks off in New Orleans, LA. Google is proud to be a Diamond Level sponsor of NeurIPS this year and will have a strong presence with >170 accepted papers, two keynote talks, and additional contributions to the broader research community through organizational support and involvement in >20 works...

entry.content: Posted by Yangsibo Huang, Research Intern, Google Research; Chiyuan Zhang, Research Scientist, Google Research Large embedding models have emerged as a fundamental tool for various applications in recommendation systems [1, 2] and natural language processing [3, 4, 5]. Such models enable the integration of non-numerical data into deep learning models by mapping categorical or string-valued input attributes with large vocabularies to fixed-length representation vectors using embedding layers...

entry.title: Gemini: ChatGPT-Like AI From Google DeepMind! | Two Minute Papers
Talk Directly to Your Data Using Everyday Language | KDnuggets
entry.summary: DataGPT is a conversational AI data analytics software provider that delivers analysis at the speed of business questions. DataGPT empowers anyone, in any company, to talk directly to their data using...
entry.content: DataGPT is a conversational AI data analytics software provider that delivers analysis at the speed of business questions. DataGPT empowers anyone, in any company, to talk directly to their data using everyday language, revealing expert answers to complex questions instantly.

entry.title: VALID: A perceptually validated virtual avatar library for inclusion and diversity | Google AI Blog
entry.summary: Posted by Mar Gonzalez-Franco, Research Scientist, Google AR & VR In the last decade, interdisciplinary scientists have dedicated a significant amount of effort to better understand the use of avata...
entry.content: Posted by Mar Gonzalez-Franco, Research Scientist, Google AR & VR In the last decade, interdisciplinary scientists have dedicated a significant amount of effort to better understand the use of avatars, and have made many interesting observations, including the capacity of the users to embody their avatar (i.e., the illusion that the avatar body is their own) and the self-avatar follower effect, which creates a binding between the actions of the avatar and the user strong enough that the avatar...

entry.title: Continual learning in the federated-learning context | Amazon Science homepage
entry.summary: Using gradient diversity to optimize selection of past samples for retention improves performance while combatting catastrophic forgetting.
entry.content: Using gradient diversity to optimize selection of past samples for retention improves performance while combatting catastrophic forgetting.

entry.content: The illustration adventure game Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist incorporates a system where you can play in-game as a 3D character of your choice. Since being released in April, the game has allowed anyone and everyone, including VTubers, to use their own 3D avatar characters for live streaming. This‚Ä¶

entry.title: 7 Reasons Why You Shouldn‚Äôt Become a Data Scientist | KDnuggets
entry.summary: Is data science really the right career option for you? Well, it depends. And that is why we put together this opinionated guide with insights from data professionals.
entry.content: Is data science really the right career option for you? Well, it depends. And that is why we put together this opinionated guide with insights from data professionals.

entry.title: Beyond Guesswork: Leveraging Bayesian Statistics for Effective Article Title Selection | KDnuggets
entry.summary: The article discusses how Bayesian multi-armed bandit algorithms can optimize digital media title selection, surpassing traditional A/B testing methods, demonstrated with a Python example, to boost au...
entry.content: The article discusses how Bayesian multi-armed bandit algorithms can optimize digital media title selection, surpassing traditional A/B testing methods, demonstrated with a Python example, to boost audience engagement and decision-making in content creation.
